data.meta_site_name: St. Pierre Family | Funeral Service & Crematory
data.text:
Joan Huffman, 91, of Morristown, passed away Thursday, March 2, 2017. She was formerly of Anderson. She was born on August 7, 1925, in Anderson to the late, Ross & Mae (Craig) Myers. Joan graduated Anderson High School in 1943. She retried from Gwinn’s Drugs after 28 years as a clerk. She is survived by her children, David (wife, Jane) Brattain of New Palestine and daughter, Amy Jo Brooks of Anderson; granddaughters, Wendy Heugel & Joni McKee. She was preceded by her husband, Bryant Huffman; children, Donald Bruce, Ross Brattain, & Emily Brattain; brother, Vance Myers; nephew, Daniel Myers. Arrangements are entrusted to Brown-Butz-Diedring Funeral Service & Crematory.

Ms. Joan Huffman

August 7, 1925 - March 2, 2017

Joan Huffman, 91, of Morristown, passed away Thursday, March 2, 2017. She was formerly of Anderson. She was born on August 7, 1925, in Anderson to the late, Ross & Mae (Craig) Myers. Joan graduated Anderson High School in 1943. She retried from Gwinn’s Drugs after 28 years as a clerk. She is survived by her children, David (wife, Jane) Brattain of New Palestine and daughter, Amy Jo Brooks of Anderson; granddaughters, Wendy Heugel & Joni McKee. She was preceded by her husband, Bryant Huffman; children, Donald Bruce, Ross Brattain, & Emily Brattain; brother, Vance Myers; nephew, Daniel Myers. Arrangements are entrusted to Brown-Butz-Diedring Funeral Service & Crematory.
